about_the_game: Created by Sight Telma Club, the Moonshadows Soundtrack includes all ambient tracks featured in overworld locations of the Eveshame forest, including the credits track and a bonus track! Embark on a synthwave journey through a surreal and fantastically dark forest that sounds anything but natural as Harlow and friends plunge deeper and deeper into its mysterious depths. This over 35-minute soundtrack is sure to intrigue and delight all those who dare to pass under the Moonshadow.
detailed_description: Created by Sight Telma Club, the Moonshadows Soundtrack includes all ambient tracks featured in overworld locations of the Eveshame forest, including the credits track and a bonus track! Embark on a synthwave journey through a surreal and fantastically dark forest that sounds anything but natural as Harlow and friends plunge deeper and deeper into its mysterious depths. This over 35-minute soundtrack is sure to intrigue and delight all those who dare to pass under the Moonshadow.
legal_notice: All art and assets used in this game have been created for usage in Moonshadows and authorized to be used in promotional media associated with the project. Unauthorized duplication or usage is an infringement the collaborating artists' intellectual property rights. Bagged Tacos LLC and its owner is not liable for intellectual property violations from third parties/persons that occur as a result of its authorized usage of art assets in promotional material surrounding Moonshadows.
name: Moonshadows Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 90 MB available space

short_description: Created and composed by Sight Telma Club, the Moonshadows Ambient Soundtrack includes 9 of the ambient synthwave tracks featured in Moonshadows + 1 bonus track! Listen to the music of the forest as it unravels for you.
